LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BowieKnife_Westerado.label: bowie knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_BowieKnife_Westerado.descrip: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tomahawk_Westerado.label: tomahawk
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tomahawk_Westerado.descripti: A medium-sized axe, designed to function as a tool as well as a weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CavalrySaber_Westerado.label: cavalry saber
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_CavalrySaber_Westerado.descr: A light cavalry saber, designed to be used from horseback primarily.
